events.name: AWS Zombie Apocalypse Workshop: Building Serverless Microservice
events.description:
DevFest.Asia's most VITAL event of 2016! 
Fight Zombies and Build Serverless Microservices! 

Scenario: 
A widespread viral infection transmitted through bites that cause human corpses to reanimate and try to eat other living humans has caused the fall of civilization as we know it. This epidemic (the “Zombie Apocalypse”) has spread through every major metropolitan area around the world.

In order to fight this battle, we invite you with great urgency to register and attend the AWS Zombie Apocalypse workshop to restore order and rebuild what remains of our great civilization.

Mission Critical Tools:

- All participants must have an AWS Account established and ready to use at the event
- Laptop
- Basic familiarity of AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway, and Amazon DynamoDB
- General revulsion towards the undead
events.location: Amazon, Capital Square, 23 Church Street #10-01 Capital Square, Singapore 049481

events.name: Design and Develop a Mobile App Prototype in 2-days!
events.description:
Learn how to design and develop a mobile app by building a working prototype in 2-days! A step by step hands-on workshop that combines the best of the Design Thinking and Extreme Programming worlds, brought to you by PALO IT Singapore as part of DevFest.Asia, this experience will not leave you the same.

This workshop is intended for an audience of designers AND developers alike (from beginner to advanced level). Sign up today!
events.location: PALO IT Singapore, 26A Circular Road Singapore 049382

events.name: Conversations: Dream Space
events.description:
Dream Space 
Saturday, 19 November,2pm
Expression Gallery, Level 4
Free admission. Register in the Lobby.

Opening our blockbuster exhibition, NASA – A Human Adventure, is a riveting Conversations edition exploring humanity’s journey of space exploration. In Conversations: Dream Space, we will discover Southeast Asian approaches to space exploration and introduce some of the pioneers of the space industry from Singapore, Malaysia and Indonesia. Through presentations by scientists and space crusaders, we will learn how the human journey to space has progressed and transformed, showing that space is a topic that touches all of us.

Conversations: Dream Space also launches the Art and Science of Space season, a series of unique workshops, screenings, performances and other programmes, which happens throughout 2016-17 at ArtScience Museum. The Art and Science of Space season shows that in the 21st century, space is no longer unattainable.

Programme 
2pm 	Welcome by Honor Harger
Executive Director, ArtScience Museum
2.05pm	Introduction to the Conference by Adam Lyle
Executive Chairman of Padang & Co
2.10pm	Jukka Nurminen
Curator, NASA – A Human Adventure
2.30pm 	Venzha Christ  
Artist, Indonesian Space Science Society
2.50pm	Dr Bidushi Bhattacharya
Founder and CEO, Bhattacharya Space Enterprises
3.10pm	Q&A
3.25pm	Break
3.45pm	Welcome back by Adam Lyle
3.50pm	Izmir Yamin
Founder and Chief Executive, Independence-X Aerospace and Pulsar UAV
4.10pm	Lynette Tan
Director, Singapore Space & Technology Association (SSTA)
4.30pm	Carter Emmart 
Director of Astrovisualization, American Museum of Natural History
4.50pm	Q&A
5.10pm	End

- Venzha Christ from The House of Natural Fiber will talk about the Indonesian Space Sciences Society.
- Bidushi Bhattacharya is a Singaporean rocket scientist who has worked in spacecraft development and operations. She will speak about using space technology for good.
- Izmir Yamin will talk about his pioneering plan to send a rover to the Moon, from Malaysia.
- Lynette Tan will talk about the Singapore Space & Technology Association.
-Carter Emmart will demonstrate The Digital Universe, a software planetarium application, and the most scientifically accurate 3D map of the cosmos.

events.name: Dev Careers Meetup
events.description: Learn about the engineering and design talent landscape in Singapore and participate in our legendary 3min speed interviews with some of the coolest employers in town!
